body_html:
In current implementation, by default empty results are skipped:

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/string_split_op.cc

Line 33 in 7280daf

return str_util::Split(str, delimiter, str_util::SkipEmpty());

I think it probably makes sense to add an additional argument in tf.string_split with skip_empty:

def string_split(source, delimiter=" ", skip_empty=True):
...

I can submit a PR if tensorflow team is OK with that.

body:
In current implementation, by default empty results are skipped:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/7280dafca161eb3413ea120d3dd07c63e5254e72/tensorflow/core/kernels/string_split_op.cc#L33

I think it probably makes sense to add an additional argument in `tf.string_split` with `skip_empty`:
```
def string_split(source, delimiter=" ", skip_empty=True):
...
```

I can submit a PR if tensorflow team is OK with that.
